title: Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\PushConfig\OidcToken
name: OidcToken
description:
Contains information needed for generating an OpenID Connect token.

Generated from protobuf message google.pubsub.v1.PushConfig.OidcToken

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.service_account_email
params.description: Service account email to be used for generating the OIDC token. The caller (for CreateSubscription, UpdateSubscription, and ModifyPushConfig RPCs) must have the iam.serviceAccounts.actAs permission for the service account.

params.name: data.audience
params.description: Audience to be used when generating OIDC token. The audience claim identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for. The audience value is a single case-sensitive string. Having multiple values (array) for the audience field is not supported. More info about the OIDC JWT token audience here: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.3 Note: if not specified, the Push endpoint URL will be used.

methods.name: getServiceAccountEmail
methods.description:
Service account email to be used for generating the OIDC token. The caller (for CreateSubscription, UpdateSubscription, and ModifyPushConfig RPCs) must have the iam.serviceAccounts.actAs permission for the service account.

Generated from protobuf field string service_account_email = 1;
